title: jbgsmininggmbh
author: jbgsmininggmbh
content: Hello fellow Bitcoin enthusiasts! Our company is interested in partnering with another Bitcoin company to help grow our businesses together. We believe that a partnership would be mutually beneficial and allow us to offer more value to our customers. If you are interested in discussing a potential partnership, please feel free to reach out to us via the dm's or our email adress: info@jbgsmining.com . We look forward to hearing from you!

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: jbgsmininggmbh on April 21, 2023, 05:47:06 PMHello fellow Bitcoin enthusiasts! Our company is interested in partnering with another Bitcoin company to help grow our businesses together. We believe that a partnership would be mutually beneficial and allow us to offer more value to our customers. If you are interested in discussing a potential partnership, please feel free to reach out to us via the dm's or our email adress: info@jbgsmining.com . We look forward to hearing from you!You have just told me that you want to add a partner. But you have not described anything about you (your service/business). Also, you have not mentioned any requirement to be a partner. And more important thing is that you have not posted any information to check publicly whether your service is fake or genuine.
